description: Change permissive domain in SELinux policy

domain.description: the domain that will be added or removed from the list of permissive domains

store.description: name of the SELinux policy store to use

no_reload.description: automatically reload the policy after a change default is set to 'false' as that's what most people would want after changing one domain Note that this doesn't work on older version of the library (example EL 6), the module will silently ignore it in this case

permissive.description: indicate if the domain should or should not be set as permissive
